entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Badger
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:43 AM NST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Badger 12:30 PM NST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: 0.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 93 %
Dewpoint: -0.6°C
Wind: ESE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Rain or freezing rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to rain this afternoon. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70. High 6. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain ending early this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 24 December 2022
